text: Houghton Mifflin Harcourt (; Houghton Mifflin. Archived from the original on December 13, 2007. HMH) is an American publisher. They make textbooks, instructional technology materials, tests, and references. The company headquarters is in the Boston Financial District. ==References== Category:Publishing companies of the United States
title: Houghton Mifflin Harcourt
